meanings.definition: A person who is a member of a consociation.
meanings.sent1: She is a consociates in the group that meets every week.
meanings.sent2: The consociates gathered for their annual meeting.
meanings.sent3: The consociates shared a laugh over their inside jokes.
meanings.sent4: In the world of consociates, trust is the currency.
meanings.sent5: The bond between consociates is unbreakable.

meanings.definition: To associate or unite in a consociation.
meanings.sent1: They consociates to work on the project together.
meanings.sent2: The different groups consociates for a common cause.
meanings.sent3: The team consociates their efforts to achieve success.
meanings.sent4: In times of crisis, people consociates to support each other.
meanings.sent5: Consociating with like-minded individuals can lead to great outcomes.
